maze.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a complicated and confusing arrangement of streets, roads etc
maze.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: I was led through a maze of corridors.
maze.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a large number of rules, instructions etc which are complicated and difficult to understand
maze.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a specially designed system of paths, often in a park or public garden, which is difficult to find your way through
maze.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: We got completely lost in the maze.
maze.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: a childrenâ€™s game, played on paper, in which you try to draw a line through a complicated group of lines without crossing any of them
